traits.name: Tacticians Mind
traits.description: every time you consume Lock On on an attack gain a +2 on the roll in addition to the accuracy provided

traits.name: Tacticians Eye
traits.description: Once per round, you may change the damage type of one attack to any other basic damage type (Kinetic/Energy/Explosive)

core_system.name: Tactician Network
core_system.effect: Until the end of the Encounter you can make a Tech Attack as a quick action, if the attack succeeds you can decide two actions as the only actions the target can take in their next turn.

traits.name: Forge-worker
traits.description: the Hephaestus has resistance to burn and heat damage.

traits.name: Armourer
traits.description: the Hephaestus can have up to 6 armour (rather than 4)

traits.name: Unbalanced
traits.description: the Hephaestus gets +1 difficulty on Agility checks

core_system.name: Smelting Touch
core_system.effect: For the rest of your Encounter each weapon you use deals an additional 5 burn and 5 heat damage

traits.name: Freedom of the Waves
traits.description: in low grav or zero grav environments the poseidon gains +3 speed

traits.name: In His Element
traits.description: the Poseidon is able to Hover in all environments.

core_system.name: Tsunami
core_system.description: The Poseidon releases nanoparticles into the air which make the air around the Poseidon hyper dense.
core_system.effect: Until the end of the encounter a burst 20 area around the Poseidon is treated as a Low grav environment but all characters are treated as Slowed. The Poseidon and any other mech the Poseidon’s pilot specifics are not Slowed within the area.

traits.name: Hunter’s Speed
traits.description: if any mech within Range 20 has a higher current speed than you, your speed increases to match it.

traits.name: Flanking Strike
traits.description: when attacking any mech with a lower speed than you, you attack with +1 Accuracy.

core_system.name: Master Archer

integrated.name: Silver Bow
integrated.effect: As a quick action before attacking with the Silver Bow in a round, you can charge the shot and give the attack +2 Accuracy and +1d6 AP Kinetic damage on hit. If the shot is not fired before the end of your turn the action is wasted and does not carry over to the next round.

core_system.effect: Three times before the end of the encounter by using a full round action you can target the pilot of a mech rather than the mech with an attack from the Silver bow. The attack rolls as if it is attacking the mech but deals damage to the pilot and ignores any protections the mech has to damage. You cannot charge a shot with this ability.
